title: Festivals in Taiwan
creator_credit: Yu Ping Chung, David J.C. Shih, Weng Jeng-Yih and Goang Jiann Enterprises Corporation
brief_description: Chinese traditions, customs and festivals centre around the lunar calendar. In Taiwan, these customs and festivals take the form of a unique culture of temple fairs, each with their own local emphasis.
creator_credit_for_label: Yu Ping Chung, David J.C. Shih, Weng Jeng-Yih and Goang Jiann Enterprises Corporation
